abstract: New York Gov Andrew Cuomo plans to announce yearlong initiative to cover citizenship application fee for 2,000 people, selected by lottery, who are just above federal poverty line; private donors will match public money to fund program.
lead_paragraph: The contest, part of an initiative called NaturalizeNY, will pay the fee, which costs about $700, for the 2,000 entrants who win.

headline.main: Lottery Will Cover Citizenship Application Fee for New York State Residents
headline.print_headline: New Lottery Will Cover Fees for Citizenship Applications

snippet: The contest, part of an initiative called NaturalizeNY, will pay the fee, which costs about $700, for the 2,000 entrants who win....
